en.bdb: Dissemblers are accurst by the Guru

verse.gurmukhi: koiel kWau rlweIAin ikau hovin iekY[
verse.unicode: ਕੋਇਲ ਕਾਂਉ ਰਲਾਈਅਨਿ ਕਿਉ ਹੋਵਨਿ ਇਕੈ।

en.bdb: Crows and cuckoos however mixed, cannot be one.

transliteration.english: koil kaa(n)au ralaieean kiau hovan ikai|
transliteration.hindi: कोइल काँउ रलाईअनि किउ होवनि इकै।
transliteration.en: koil kaa(n)au ralaieean kiau hovan ikai|
transliteration.hi: कोइल काँउ रलाईअनि किउ होवनि इकै।
transliteration.ipa: kɔeɪl kɑⁿo rəlɑein kɪo hɔʋən eɪkæ.

verse.gurmukhi: iqau inMdk jg jwxIAin boil bolix iPkY[
verse.unicode: ਤਿਉ ਨਿੰਦਕ ਜਗ ਜਾਣੀਅਨਿ ਬੋਲਿ ਬੋਲਣਿ ਫਿਕੈ।

en.bdb: Likewise the slanderers are distinguished in the world by their cheap and low talk.

transliteration.english: tiau ni(n)dhak jag jaaneean bol bolan fikai|
transliteration.hindi: तिउ निंदक जग जाणीअनि बोलि बोलणि फिकै।
transliteration.en: tiau ni(n)dhak jag jaaneean bol bolan fikai|
transliteration.hi: तिउ निंदक जग जाणीअनि बोलि बोलणि फिकै।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɪo nɪŋd̪ək d͡ʒəG d͡ʒɑɳiən bɔl bɔləɳ fɪkæ.
transliteration.ur: تِا نںدک جگ جاݨیِان بول بولݨ پھکَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: bguly hMsu brwbrI ikau imkin imkY[
verse.unicode: ਬਗੁਲੇ ਹੰਸੁ ਬਰਾਬਰੀ ਕਿਉ ਮਿਕਨਿ ਮਿਕੈ।

en.bdb: How can a crane and a swan be equated by the same measurement?

transliteration.english: bagule ha(n)s baraabaree kiau mikan mikai|
transliteration.hindi: बगुले हंसु बराबरी किउ मिकनि मिकै।
transliteration.en: bagule ha(n)s baraabaree kiau mikan mikai|
transliteration.hi: बगुले हंसु बराबरी किउ मिकनि मिकै।
transliteration.ipa: bəGʊle həŋs bərɑbəri kɪo mɪkən mɪkæ.
transliteration.ur: بگلے هںس برابریِ کا مکن مکَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: iqau bymuK cuix kFIAin muih kwly itkY[
verse.unicode: ਤਿਉ ਬੇਮੁਖ ਚੁਣਿ ਕਢੀਅਨਿ ਮੁਹਿ ਕਾਲੇ ਟਿਕੈ।

en.bdb: Similarly the apostates are picked up, separated and stigmatized.

transliteration.english: tiau bemukh chun kaddeean muh kaale Tikai|
transliteration.hindi: तिउ बेमुख चुणि कढीअनि मुहि काले टिकै।
transliteration.en: tiau bemukh chun kaddeean muh kaale Tikai|
transliteration.hi: तिउ बेमुख चुणि कढीअनि मुहि काले टिकै।
transliteration.ipa: t̪ɪo bemʊkʰ t͡ʃʊɳ kəʈiən mʊh kɑle ʈɪkæ.
transliteration.ur: تِا بےمکھ چُݨ کڈھیِان مُه کالے ٹکَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: ikAw nIswxI mIixAw Kotu swlI iskY[
verse.unicode: ਕਿਆ ਨੀਸਾਣੀ ਮੀਣਿਆ ਖੋਟੁ ਸਾਲੀ ਸਿਕੈ।

en.bdb: What is the hall mark of dissemblers? They are like counter-feit coins of a fake mint.

transliteration.english: kiaa neesaanee meeniaa khoT saalee sikai|
transliteration.hindi: किआ नीसाणी मीणिआ खोटु साली सिकै।
transliteration.en: kiaa neesaanee meeniaa khoT saalee sikai|
transliteration.hi: किआ नीसाणी मीणिआ खोटु साली सिकै।
transliteration.ipa: kɪəɑ nisɑɳi miɳɪəɑ kʰɔʈ sɑli sɪkæ.
transliteration.ur: کِآ نیِساݨیِ میِݨآ کھوٹ سالیِ سکَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: isir isir pwhxI mwrIAin Eie pIr iPitkY ]8]
verse.unicode: ਸਿਰਿ ਸਿਰਿ ਪਾਹਣੀ ਮਾਰੀਅਨਿ ਓਇ ਪੀਰ ਫਿਟਿਕੈ ॥੮॥

en.bdb: Shoe beating is given on their heads and they are cursed by the preceptor.

transliteration.english: sir sir paahanee maareean oi peer fiTikai ||8||
transliteration.hindi: सिरि सिरि पाहणी मारीअनि ओइ पीर फिटिकै ॥८॥
transliteration.en: sir sir paahanee maareean oi peer fiTikai ||8||
transliteration.hi: सिरि सिरि पाहणी मारीअनि ओइ पीर फिटिकै ॥८॥
transliteration.ipa: sɪr sɪr pɑhəɳi mɑriən oeɪ pir fɪʈɪkæ.8.
transliteration.ur: سِر سر پاهݨیِ ماریِان اوِا پیِر پھٹِکَے ۔۔۸۔۔
